name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Integration Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing and integrating high-performance solutions within the healthcare sector, focusing on Mirth, HL7, XML, and JSON for seamless data exchange. I possess advanced skills in **API** integration and have hands-on experience in **data migration**, ensuring data integrity and compliance with industry standards. My technical proficiency extends to **Python** and **JavaScript**, enabling me to leverage modern frameworks for effective problem solving.

My strong foundation in **cloud architecture** with platforms such as **Azure** and **AWS**, coupled with expertise in **MS-SQL** and **SQL**, allows me to architect robust systems that are scalable and secure. I pride myself on my excellent communication and time management skills, which support effective collaboration with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality results.
